name: The Power of Love
description:
A Gauntlet of enemies in haunting locales await you and up to five friends (usb game controllers required for multiplayer). This game was made for the Global Game Jam 2013.
Share food to develop relationships and heal your wounds, or be greedy and powerup your strength. But remember: Everyone needs to eat! Monsters will appear from their nests which you will have to break. Destroy the heart of the area to open the locked door! (Note: buildings and the heart have no visible feedback that you are hurting them. just keep swinging, young hero!)
Equip rare equipment to be even stronger!

Art and level design by FrankieSmileShow
Music by cboyardee
Programming and enemy+weapon design by The Monstre King

  • 9 Characters to choose from with vaguely different stats!
  • Various weapons with slightly discernible effects. Armor and other equipment will protect you, and food can help you both power up and fall in love.
  • Romance will realistically improve your chances of finding rare treasures. Share your food!
  • A variety of enemies will act differently. Don't be overrun, destroy the horde but break their nests too!
